name: Thrive
notes:
Requirements:
glibc 2.28 (you can recompile the game with older glibc). Recent graphics drivers. Nouveau drivers for Nvidia don't work.
content:
files:
- launcher:
    filename: Thrive-Launcher.AppImage
    url: https://github.com/Revolutionary-Games/Thrive-Launcher/releases/download/1.1.0/Thrive.Launcher.1.1.0.AppImage
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/Thrive-Launcher.AppImage
installer:
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/
    src: launcher
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/Thrive-Launcher.AppImage
require-binaries: glibc
